37 #if defined (ARDUINO_AVR_UNO) || defined (ARDUINO_AVR_YUN) \

40 #elif defined (ARDUINO_AVR_LEONARDO)
41 #define DEFAULT_DXL_BUF_LENGTH 256
42 #elif defined (OpenCR)

49 #if (DEFAULT_DXL_BUF_LENGTH > 0xFFFF)
50 #error "\r\nError : DEFAULT_DXL_BUF_LENGTH is OVERFLOW! This must be a 16 bit range."

55 // >> Legacy (Deprecated since v0.4.0)
56 #if defined (ARDUINO_AVR_UNO) || defined (ARDUINO_AVR_YUN) \
57  || defined (ARDUINO_AVR_INDUSTRIAL101)
58 #define DXL_MAX_NODE 16
59 #define DXL_MAX_NODE_BUFFER_SIZE 10
60 #elif defined (ARDUINO_AVR_LEONARDO)
61 #define DXL_MAX_NODE 16
62 #define DXL_MAX_NODE_BUFFER_SIZE 12
63 #elif defined (OpenCR)
64 #define DXL_MAX_NODE 253 // Max number of XEL on DYNAMIXEL protocol
65 #define DXL_MAX_NODE_BUFFER_SIZE 32
66 #else
67 #define DXL_MAX_NODE 16
68 #define DXL_MAX_NODE_BUFFER_SIZE 16
69 #endif
70 
71 #define DXL_BUF_LENGTH (DXL_MAX_NODE*DXL_MAX_NODE_BUFFER_SIZE + 11) // 11 = Header(3)+Reserved(1)+ID(1)+Length(2)+Instruction(1)+Error(1)+crc(2)
72 #if (DXL_BUF_LENGTH > DEFAULT_DXL_BUF_LENGTH)
73 #undef DEFAULT_DXL_BUF_LENGTH
74 #define DEFAULT_DXL_BUF_LENGTH DXL_BUF_LENGTH
75 #endif
76 
77 #if (DXL_MAX_NODE > 253)
78 #error "\r\nError : DXL_MAX_NODE is OVERFLOW! This should be less or equal than 253 by the protocol."
79 #endif
80 #if (DXL_MAX_NODE_BUFFER_SIZE > 0xFF)
81 #error "\r\nError : DXL_MAX_NODE_BUFFER_SIZE is OVERFLOW! This must be a 8 bit range."
82 #endif
83 #if (DXL_BUF_LENGTH > 0xFFFF)
84 #error "\r\nError : DXL_BUF_LENGTH is OVERFLOW! This must be a 16 bit range."
85 #endif
86 // << Legacy (Deprecated since v0.4.0)
